value:
Alfonse was once friends with a great
Hero. But when Alfonse lost his friend
in battle, he was never the same.

We can revive Heroes who fall
during battle as long as you're
with us, Summoner.$k$pStill, though this reverses the
ravages of the battlefield,
they feel pain—just as we do.

Checking up on everyone? Thank
you. That's helpful. Let me know
if you spot anything unusual!

How about we get some practice in?
That'd make you a stronger member
of our group—summoning and all!

Good timing. I made some official
merchandise for the Order of Heroes.
Think they'll sell?

Looks like your group is strong. I'd
better keep building mine. Oh, hello
from $Nf!

I'm going to push myself even
harder now!

Good! But as commander, I must
keep striving for more.

I expect much more of myself
than that!

Thanks for helping me get stronger.
I swear to make it worth your trouble.

I have an assessment to make.
You've become more dependable
than I ever imagined.$k$pFrankly, I wasn't certain about you
from the start. You were new to
us. We were new to you.$k$pBut look at you now—a great
tactician, giving us directions that
are often excellent!$k$pRemember when you first showed up
and I said you didn't look like the
Great Hero from our legend?$k$pI'm sorry about all of that. As the
commander here, I should know to
never judge a book by its cover.$k$pThe person who was once my
superior drilled that into my head.
So, I should have known better.$k$pYou are the Great Hero, and you
have lived up to the legend!$k$pStill, you're also part of my Order of
Heroes, so don't expect any
preferential treatment.$k$pBut until the day comes when we
save this kingdom once and for all,
you and I are in this...together.
Rule number one! Treat Heroes with utmost respect!
Rule number two! Defend the gateways at any cost!
Think I have a familiar face? Hmm. How curious.
That divine weapon of yours was just lying around here... None of us could use it.
Some of us befriend Heroes. Others stay detached. What will you do, I wonder...
Know a quick way to make a profit? Then let's hear it!
I give you my vow as commander that I will keep you safe.
Shadow Dragon and the Blade of Light
When using a bow, you must keep space between you and your foe.
